paragraphs.content: Peter saith unto him, Thou needest not to wash my feet. Jesus answered him, If I wash thee not, thou hast no part with me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Peter saith unto him, Thou needest not to wash my feet. Jesus answered him, If I wash thee not, thou hast no part with me.

paragraphs.content: Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.

paragraphs.content: Jesus saith to him, He that has washed his hands and his head, needeth not save to wash his feet, but is clean every whit; and ye are clean, but not all. Now this was the custom of the Jews under their law; wherefore, Jesus did this that the law might be fulfilled.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Jesus saith to him, He that has washed his hands and his head, needeth not save to wash his feet, but is clean every whit; and ye are clean, but not all. Now this was the custom of the Jews under their law; wherefore, Jesus did this that the law might be fulfilled.
